PackageOracle.name: DA_CALL_CENTER_WITNESS
PackageOracle.source:
CREATE OR REPLACE PACKAGE CHTR.DA_CALL_CENTER_WITNESS
/* Generated on 20-JAN-15 03.39.43.912859000 PM -06:00 */
AS

FUNCTION add (
process_rec IN pkg_logging.t_process_rec
,ani_number IN VARCHAR2
,local_end_dttm IN TIMESTAMP
,local_start_dttm IN TIMESTAMP
,pbx_id IN VARCHAR2
,session_dur_amt IN NUMBER
,tot_hold_tm_amt IN NUMBER
,audit_user IN VARCHAR2
) return NUMBER;

PROCEDURE add (
process_rec IN pkg_logging.t_process_rec
,ani_number IN VARCHAR2
,local_end_dttm IN TIMESTAMP
,local_start_dttm IN TIMESTAMP
,pbx_id IN VARCHAR2
,session_dur_amt IN NUMBER
,tot_hold_tm_amt IN NUMBER
,audit_user IN VARCHAR2
);

PROCEDURE add (
process_rec IN pkg_logging.t_process_rec
,call_ctr_ev_id IN NUMBER
,ani_number IN VARCHAR2
,local_end_dttm IN TIMESTAMP
,local_start_dttm IN TIMESTAMP
,pbx_id IN VARCHAR2
,session_dur_amt IN NUMBER
,tot_hold_tm_amt IN NUMBER
,audit_user IN VARCHAR2
);

PROCEDURE del (
process_rec IN pkg_logging.t_process_rec
,call_ctr_ev_id IN NUMBER
,audit_user IN VARCHAR2
);

END da_call_center_witness;

body.name: DA_CALL_CENTER_WITNESS
body.source:
CREATE OR REPLACE PACKAGE BODY CHTR.DA_CALL_CENTER_WITNESS
/* Generated on 20-JAN-15 03.39.43.924430000 PM -06:00 */
AS

FUNCTION add (
process_rec IN pkg_logging.t_process_rec
,ani_number IN VARCHAR2
,local_end_dttm IN TIMESTAMP
,local_start_dttm IN TIMESTAMP
,pbx_id IN VARCHAR2
,session_dur_amt IN NUMBER
,tot_hold_tm_amt IN NUMBER
,audit_user IN VARCHAR2
) RETURN NUMBER
IS
l_return_pk NUMBER;
BEGIN

chtr.pkg_logging.log_debug (process_rec, 'begin da_call_center_witness.add(fx), parms=' || ani_number || '|' || local_end_dttm || '|' || local_start_dttm || '|' || pbx_id || '|' || session_dur_amt || '|' || tot_hold_tm_amt || '|' || audit_user || '|');
INSERT INTO chtr.t_call_center_witness a
(
a.call_ctr_ev_id
,a.ani_number
,a.local_end_dttm
,a.local_start_dttm
,a.pbx_id
,a.session_dur_amt
,a.tot_hold_tm_amt
,a.record_stat
,a.created_dttm
,a.created_by
,a.modified_dttm
,a.modified_by
)
VALUES
(
chtr.s_call_ctr_ev_id.NEXTVAL
,add.ani_number
,add.local_end_dttm
,add.local_start_dttm
,add.pbx_id
,add.session_dur_amt
,add.tot_hold_tm_amt
,'A'
,SYSTIMESTAMP
,add.audit_user
,NULL
,NULL
) RETURNING a.call_ctr_ev_id INTO l_return_pk;
chtr.pkg_logging.log_debug (process_rec, 'end da_call_center_witness.add(fx)');
RETURN l_return_pk;

END add;

PROCEDURE add (
process_rec IN pkg_logging.t_process_rec
,ani_number IN VARCHAR2
,local_end_dttm IN TIMESTAMP
,local_start_dttm IN TIMESTAMP
,pbx_id IN VARCHAR2
,session_dur_amt IN NUMBER
,tot_hold_tm_amt IN NUMBER
,audit_user IN VARCHAR2
)
IS
BEGIN

chtr.pkg_logging.log_debug (process_rec, 'begin da_call_center_witness.add, parms=' || ani_number || '|' || local_end_dttm || '|' || local_start_dttm || '|' || pbx_id || '|' || session_dur_amt || '|' || tot_hold_tm_amt || '|' || audit_user || '|');
INSERT INTO chtr.t_call_center_witness a
(
a.call_ctr_ev_id
,a.ani_number
,a.local_end_dttm
,a.local_start_dttm
,a.pbx_id
,a.session_dur_amt
,a.tot_hold_tm_amt
,a.record_stat
,a.created_dttm
,a.created_by
,a.modified_dttm
,a.modified_by
)
VALUES
(
chtr.s_call_ctr_ev_id.NEXTVAL
,add.ani_number
,add.local_end_dttm
,add.local_start_dttm
,add.pbx_id
,add.session_dur_amt
,add.tot_hold_tm_amt
,'A'
,SYSTIMESTAMP
,add.audit_user
,NULL
,NULL
);
chtr.pkg_logging.log_debug (process_rec, 'end da_call_center_witness.add');

END add;

PROCEDURE add (
process_rec IN pkg_logging.t_process_rec
,call_ctr_ev_id IN NUMBER
,ani_number IN VARCHAR2
,local_end_dttm IN TIMESTAMP
,local_start_dttm IN TIMESTAMP
,pbx_id IN VARCHAR2
,session_dur_amt IN NUMBER
,tot_hold_tm_amt IN NUMBER
,audit_user IN VARCHAR2
)
IS
BEGIN

chtr.pkg_logging.log_debug (process_rec, 'begin da_call_center_witness.add, parms=' || call_ctr_ev_id || '|' || ani_number || '|' || local_end_dttm || '|' || local_start_dttm || '|' || pbx_id || '|' || session_dur_amt || '|' || tot_hold_tm_amt || '|' || audit_user || '|');
INSERT INTO chtr.t_call_center_witness a
(
a.call_ctr_ev_id
,a.ani_number
,a.local_end_dttm
,a.local_start_dttm
,a.pbx_id
,a.session_dur_amt
,a.tot_hold_tm_amt
,a.record_stat
,a.created_dttm
,a.created_by
,a.modified_dttm
,a.modified_by
)
VALUES
(
add.call_ctr_ev_id
,add.ani_number
,add.local_end_dttm
,add.local_start_dttm
,add.pbx_id
,add.session_dur_amt
,add.tot_hold_tm_amt
,'A'
,SYSTIMESTAMP
,add.audit_user
,NULL
,NULL
);
chtr.pkg_logging.log_debug (process_rec, 'end da_call_center_witness.add');

END add;

PROCEDURE del (
process_rec IN pkg_logging.t_process_rec
,call_ctr_ev_id IN NUMBER
,audit_user IN VARCHAR2
)
IS
BEGIN

chtr.pkg_logging.log_debug (process_rec, 'begin da_call_center_witness.del, parms=' || call_ctr_ev_id || '|' || audit_user || '|');
UPDATE chtr.t_call_center_witness a
SET a.record_stat = 'D'
,a.modified_dttm = SYSTIMESTAMP
,a.modified_by = del.audit_user
WHERE a.call_ctr_ev_id = del.call_ctr_ev_id
;
chtr.pkg_logging.log_debug (process_rec, 'end da_call_center_witness.del');

END del;

END da_call_center_witness;
